```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R")
cdc <- as_tibble(cdc)
cdc
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = cdc) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = age, fill = genhlth)) +
  facet_wrap(~ smoke100)+
  labs(title = "Health Quality by Age for Smokers vs. Non-smokers")
```
